You have to use a NO-CD crack for the right version of the game, currently there are only a NO-CD crack for the 1.66c patch. The 1.7 Final patch was resently released so give it a week or two and you will have a working NO-CD crack for that patch also.

It's not that bloody to make your own NO-CD crack using the program Numega SoftICE (Best Dissasembler prog ever!!!), and the prog W32Dasm are the two you need. If you know some program language (c, c++, ASM) it's pretty easy to learn and it's fun. 

I quit because I have a real life to live also but if are a computer geek, try it you will love it. It's very easy to make your own trainers using Tsearch too, kids that are like 8-9+ years make 10+ trainers =).

and if your getting a black screen, program not responding, or if there is no music, try messing with the GAME SETTINGS you can either use the shortcut thats in the start folder, or you can use the config.exe on the cd.
